reporter_caption.center: STATE v. DISTRICT COURT OF FIFTH JUDICIAL DIST., 78 N.M. 197 (1967)

caption.center: The STATE of New Mexico ex rel., Thomas B. SHEARMAN, Thomas B. Shearman,
Jr. and William Hugh Shearman, Petitioners, v. DISTRICT COURT OF the FIFTH
JUDICIAL DISTRICT of the State of New Mexico WITHIN AND FOR CHAVES COUNTY,
New Mexico, and Honorable George L. Reese, Jr., District Judge,

opinion.opinion_text:
CHAVEZ, Chief Justice, and NOBLE, MOISE, COMPTON and CARMODY, Justices, concurring.
Ordered that the petition for writ of prohibition be and the same is hereby denied.
